channel.title: [Delta] Freenationz, bringing democracy to the private server world
channel.description:
Sup all its Disastercall
ok so basically about the democracy thing im planning on making different positions for players, not staff but a whole new thing and to be into that position you have to be elected by staff members, and people. Same thing for staff, staff have to be elected and approved by the main administrators.
This is a skilling server mainly but it also has Pk and Dueling
ok so what i did so far
Finished:
Almost all the skills Prayer (70% done)
Home Pk Duel Custom minigame Main fighting areas Gambling npc Shops and all the basic things
client:
HD full screen
Almost done:
Awesome jail system ( I got the idea from another post it its basically a jury, so who ever came up with that tutorial i guess 70% credits, im going to make the entire thing myself i wont be using his codes) Custom items more like props like cigerates and etc.. XD
Ill add pictures as soon as i finish the jail
website: http://www.freenationz.com
I hope to see you guys following up anyways peace out! dont forget to leave comments! Any suggestion, friendly critisizim or anything else would be useful

@disastercall wrote:

gravenfire23:

Nice nulled vB, you need permission to post you’re website.

ya i know it is, and had no idea needed permission
